abstract: Starboard Value sent a letter to AOL’s board on Tuesday, to congratulate the directors on the patent sale to Microsoft, and to warn them of a coming proxy fight.
snippet: Starboard Value sent a letter to AOL’s board on Tuesday, to congratulate the directors on the patent sale to Microsoft, and to warn them of a coming proxy fight.
lead_paragraph: AOL will need more than a billion-dollar patent sale to quell the ire of one of its largest shareholders.

headline.main: AOL Patent Deal Does Not Appease Starboard
